name: The Ok Button
description:
Probably the shortest game on earth. Go back to the 19th century and use a old command console to press THE BUTTON and see what happens. this game is free of fund and made in Just BASIC. it is inspired from "There is no a game" now just play the game and enjoy for 10 seconds

STEPS TO DOWNLOAD

click on download to download the folder if the download completes and says something like this file is dangerous then ignore it(it's because it uses a old program) Open The-Button Game folder and ignore all the different documents(that's the data). Open The-Button.exe and play the game. 

Download Just BASIC:

Just BASIC. program language,
